mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY ( study_Id, study_name, study_password, study_start, study_end) VALUES (#{studyId}, #{studyName}, #{studyPassword}, #{studyStart}, #{studyEnd})
mapper.select: SELECT , GREATEST(0, CURRENT_DATE - study_start) AS elapsed_days, CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE < study_start THEN study_start - CURRENT_DATE WHEN study_end IS NOT NULL AND CURRENT_DATE > study_end THEN 0 ELSE study_end - CURRENT_DATE END AS remaining_days FROM STUDY WHERE study_Id = #{studyId}
